name: Wellington
description: Licensed Wellington electricians serving the 'Equestrian Capital of the World'. Solomon Electric provides professional residential and commercial services tailored for high-end estates and equestrian properties.
tagline: The Equestrian Capital of the World

challenges.title: Equestrian Electrical Excellence
challenges.description: Wellington's world-famous barns and stables require specialized wiring for safety, specialized arena lighting, and robust, weather-hardened power systems.

challenges.title: High-End Estate Distribution
challenges.description: Luxury homes in communities like Aeroclub and Versailles require massive power capacity, sophisticated automation integration, and significant backup power readiness.

challenges.title: Western Storm Vulnerability
challenges.description: As one of the westernmost Palm Beach cities, Wellington faces intense seasonal storms. We focus on high-performance surge protection to guard expensive estate systems.

faqs.question: Do you understand the electrical requirements for world-class equestrian barns?
faqs.answer: Yes, Wellington's equestrian facilities are part of our specialty work. Horse barns require dust-tight fixtures to handle hay and bedding, GFCI protection throughout, safe switch and outlet placement away from horse contact, and properly rated circuits for fans, heaters, and wash stall equipment. Arena lighting is another specialty—we design and install arena systems that meet competition standards.

faqs.question: Our Wellington estate needs more than 200 amps—can you handle that?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Many Wellington estates require 400-600 amp service to power main homes, guest houses, pools, outdoor entertainment, barns, and extensive landscape lighting. We design multi-panel systems with proper load balancing, coordinate with FPL for service upgrades, and ensure your estate has the capacity for current needs plus future additions.

faqs.question: During polo season, our property hosts events—can you handle temporary electrical?
faqs.answer: Yes, we understand the seasonal surge in electrical demand during Wellington's equestrian and polo season. We can install temporary power for tents and hospitality areas, ensure existing systems are ready for heavy use, and provide on-call support during events. Planning ahead is key—book early for polo season electrical needs.

faqs.question: Can you integrate with high-end home automation systems like Savant or Control4?
faqs.answer: Yes, we're experienced with luxury automation platforms including Savant, Control4, Crestron, and Lutron. For Wellington estates, we provide the electrical infrastructure that automation systems require—proper panel capacity, dedicated control circuits, low-voltage wiring runs, and coordination with automation integrators.

faqs.question: Wellington has intense summer lightning—how do we protect our systems?
faqs.answer: Western Palm Beach County is extremely lightning-prone. For Wellington properties with significant electronics, automation, and expensive equestrian equipment, we recommend comprehensive surge protection: whole-home protection at the main panel, plus point-of-use protection for sensitive systems. This multi-layer approach catches surges before they damage expensive equipment.

faqs.question: How quickly can you respond to emergencies in Wellington?
faqs.answer: We provide emergency electrical service to Wellington and the western Palm Beach County communities. Our licensed electricians handle critical situations including total power loss, electrical burning smells, and panel failures. Contact us 24/7 for immediate assistance—our team is available around the clock.

seoContent.heading: Premier Wellington Electricians – Serving the World of Equestrian Excellence
seoContent.body: Wellington is a community of prestige and precision, known globally as the capital of equestrian sports. It's a city that values tradition, quality, and exceptional service. Solomon Electric is proud to provide the licensed expertise that Wellington's premier homes and facilities count on to stay powered and safe. Our electricians are dispatched from strategic locations across Palm Beach County, often arriving within 60 minutes. We maintain full parts inventory on every truck, so most repairs and installations are completed in a single visit.

seoContent.heading: Expert Electrical Solutions for Wellington Properties
seoContent.body: Whether your Wellington property needs panel upgrades, modern lighting, EV charging, or emergency repairs, our licensed electricians deliver solutions built for Palm Beach County's building codes and South Florida's demanding climate. We handle all permitting and inspections so you don't have to. Every project in Wellington is handled by W-2 employees—never subcontractors. Our electricians are drug-tested, background-checked, and carry our $2M liability insurance. We treat your home with the same care and respect we'd want in our own.

seoContent.heading: Serving Every Neighborhood in Wellington
seoContent.body: From Aeroclub, Wycliffe, Grand Isles to Wellington Shores, our electricians provide full-service coverage throughout Wellington. We understand the specific electrical characteristics of each area — from older homes that need rewiring to new construction requiring modern smart home systems. Wellington properties face unique electrical challenges from South Florida's heat, humidity, and storm exposure. We use marine-grade hardware, UV-resistant conduit, and corrosion-resistant components that last in this environment.

seoContent.heading: Advanced Electrical Care for Your Wellington Property
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading the lighting in a luxury arena, modernizing the automation in an estate home, or requiring the peace of mind of a whole-home backup power system, our team is ready to assist. We provide clean, professional, and code-compliant work that matches the high standards of the Wellington community. From routine outlet installations to complex rewiring projects, we handle all aspects of residential and commercial electrical work in Wellington. Every job includes upfront pricing, clean worksite practices, and a satisfaction guarantee.
